A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: What Rian Johnson did with the character of Luke Skywalker was a travesty.  First he destroyed Luke through character assassination\, then needlessly killed him off after bi-locating across the galaxy.  He presents Luke as a bitter old man\, not the beacon of hope we have known in the past.  This was a huge disappointment for me so much so that I do not plan on seeing episode 9.  Nor do I plan on watching any more movies associated with Rian Johnson.
